events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I need to return it because the size is completely wrong and it doesn't fit at all.
The customer's return request has been identified as a refund case due to size mismatch and return inquiry.
Assigning refund case to customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds for apparel.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your jacket. I’m here to help you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 456789123. The jacket is new, with tags still attached, and it’s in the original box it came in.
Thank you for the details. We will process your return and refund once we receive the product. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help and will send the item back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned jacket and completed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
Closing the case as the refund has been processed successfully and no further action is needed from either side.
